author: dfs
msg: Changed WORD opcode back to ALNUM and the new ALNUM to ALNUMC to match
Perl's nomenclature.  Accidentally reformatted some of Perl5Compiler.java
using Emacs indent region, producing a spurious diff.

author: dfs
msg: Added Dan Lipofsky's suggested enhancement to implement the Java 1.1

author: dfs
msg: Applied Takashi's fix for his posix character class patch.

author: dfs
msg: Added MULTILINE_MASK flag to AwkCompiler and changed default behavior of
'.' to match newlines, conforming with normal awk behavior.
Updated CHANGES file to reflect latest changes.
